mapper.sql: id, acct_no, acct_name, status, create_date, modify_date, user_code, user_name, user_code_last_modify, user_name_last_modify
mapper.insert: insert into acct_info(acct_no, acct_name, status, create_date, modify_date, user_code, user_name, user_code_last_modify, user_name_last_modify) values(#{acctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acctName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCodeLastModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNameLastModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
